name: Duck Storm
description:
v1.2

WASD keys to move. Survive as long as you can. The storm gets worse as the game continues. Watch out for lightning! It might kill you. collect the hearts to get more health, and try to beat the record. press k to open the shop, and use time to buy upgrades. Watch out for bosses! They will try to kill you.           

To shoot at the bosses, press m.

If you don't want the sound, then press the down arrow. if you want the sound, press the up arrow
